equalizeAdapthist.title: equalize_adapthist

kernel_size.title: kernel_size
kernel_size.tooltip: int or array_like, optional, Clipping limit, Defines the shape of contextual regions used in the algorithm.

clip_limit.title: clip_limit
clip_limit.tooltip: float, optional, Clipping limit, normalized between 0 and 1 (higher values give more contrast).

nbins.title: nbins
nbins.tooltip: int, optional, Number of gray bins for histogram ('data range').
